course_title: Special Topics: Film and Media: Art,Theory,&Practice ofEditing
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Post Production: This class has an additional prerequisite of FILM 107. Please contact Ale Perozo Borges (alejandra.perozo@emory.edu) for a permission number.


While students will learn workflows and other technical skills this course is centered on the art and theories of film editing put into practice.
course_description: Rotating topics in film and media. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
